allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement st depend command

Add command to create edges between issues:
- st depend <source> --needs <target>   \(DependsOn\)
- st depend <source> --blocks <target>  \(Blocks\)
- st depend <source> --relates-to <target>
- st depend <source> --parent <target>
- st depend <source> --duplicates <target>

Validates both issues exist, prevents self-reference and duplicates.
Stores edges as git blobs with index in sterna/index/edges.

Closes: st-d439
EOF
\)")
